hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.subtitle: Lead and Full Stack Developer | Open Source Contributor

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack & Lead Developer with expertise in building modern web applications. Despite working in the backend, I am very much enthusiastic about frontend technologies. My expertise includes PHP, Magento, Drupal, Prestashop, JavaScript, TypeScript, Nuxt, Vue, MySQL, Android, Flutter, Strapi. Additionally, I like to contribute to the open source community.
